overview:
As GET IT Mobile’s Vice President of Business Development, Mike is responsible for sales and business development in all industry segments. At the forefront of branded interactive media since 1999, Mike has helped some of the world’s leading brands and media properties expand to the digital and mobile realms. His list of clients includes ESPN, Procter & Gamble, Miller Brewing, Discovery Channel, Oakley, the Weather Channel, Coca Cola, CBS, Mattel, and Sony Pictures.

Prior to GET IT Mobile, Mike held senior sales and business development positions at both startups and Fortune 500 companies, including iPhone developer and publisher Skyworks Interactive, interactive marketing agency BrandPlay Entertainment (he was also a co-founder), the National Football League, and the New York Times Sports & Leisure Magazine Group.
